### PR Checklist

Be careful to check your PR meets the following expectations.

The following criteria is applied to PRs that want to include new items to the awesome list.

**List-specific criteria**
* [ ] item is research-related.
* [ ] item is guidance about academia or research skills.
* [ ] item is likely to remail relevant long-term.

**Awesome list general requirements**
* [ ] Only awesome items. Awesome lists are curations of the best, not everything.
* [ ] The item uses consistent and correct naming.
* [ ] The item has a title (with a hyperlink) and a description.
* [ ] The description is concise and informative.
* [ ] The description is in the same language as the title.
* [ ] The item link and description are separated by a dash, e.g., `[AVA](â€¦) - JavaScript test runner.`
* [ ] The description starts with an uppercase character and ends with a period.

Note that items are sorted alphabetically,in ascending order by title, within the containing sublist.
